text: Jaba tiniharukaham amana va bhayako kunai samacara a'umcha bhane tyasala'i prasarita garna thalchan jaba ki tyo samacarala'i paigambara (sa.) Ra aphna bud'dhijiviharukaham sumpeko bha'e ta uniharule parianama nikali'eko kurako tathya thaha pa'umdathe. Ra yadi timimathi allahako krpa ra daya nabha'eko bha'e ta kehi baheka sabai saitanaka anuyayi hune thi'e
